item.title: About
item.description: Halo, I am Fadhil Yori Hibatullah. I am an Infrastructure and Network Operations for Trustmedis.com and also a member of the research team at Kelompok Linux Arek Suroboyo (Surabaya Linux User Group). I manage the Buaya repository server and also some services owned by KLAS. Connect with me
